channel.title: The Mopar State Thread
channel.description:
Not sure if this will go anywhere but I will try to make it to go somewhere...!
Point of the thread, to have a large listing(of those who post at least) of where they live. It would be cool to find out who actually lives near you. I know from personally asking a couple of people that I live only like 50 miles away from one person. :)
I will add states as they are listed. Do note this is totally [u]optional[/u] just something for fun.
EDIT: Almost forgot, if you live somewhere outside of the states you can also state that place and I will add it in a different continent place.
Before anybody starts hating and says something about "you can post your country in your profile" who honestly views that stuff...
Special credits to:
Runescape Sucks: - For Fixing some bbc issues The Wanderer: - For original map Dunder Mifflinc: - For the current map
[img]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/untitled-6.jpg[/img]

item.title: The Mopar State Thread
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

how about, instead of having dozens of states, counties and territories that are empty, when someone lists their state, county or territory you add that to the list? I’m sure people know what state, county or territory they are in without having to consult a list first

I reside in Devon, may as well be Cornwall since I live a mere bridge and <10 miles away from Cornwall

Read full topic
